meanings.definition: A Greek baked pasta dish with ground meat and béchamel sauce.
meanings.sent1: My mom made delicious pastitsio for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: I ordered pastitsio at the Greek restaurant and it was amazing.
meanings.sent3: The pastitsio was so good, it disappeared in seconds at the potluck.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the baking pastitsio filled the entire kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The golden crust on top of the pastitsio was irresistible.

meanings.definition: The act of making or eating pastitsio.
meanings.sent1: We all gathered in the kitchen for the pastitsio preparation.
meanings.sent2: The family tradition includes a special ceremony before pastitsio consumption.
meanings.sent3: His passion for pastitsio led him to create a new recipe.
meanings.sent4: Eating pastitsio together always brings us closer as a family.
meanings.sent5: The joy of sharing pastitsio with loved ones is priceless.
